channel.desc: Mae Crawc yn penderfynu creu ei bersawr chwaethus ei hun. When the weasels ruin Toad's perfume and then occupy his home, is the new stinky cologne the answer to regaining Toad Hall.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Byd Bach
channel.desc: Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn darganfod beth yw'r pethau defnyddiol mewn natur. In this episode we'll discover which things in nature are useful to us, such as how trees help us.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Y tro hwn, byddwn yn cwrdd ? dau anifail sydd i'w canfod wrth fynd am dro, sef y ceffyl a'r hwyaden. We meet two animals that can be found when we go for a walk - the horse and the duck.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Ysgol Pwll Coch sy'n help yng Ngwesty Sigldigwt heddiw a byddwn yn cwrdd ag Annie a Megan sy'n berchen ceffylau. We meet Annie and Megan who both own horses.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
channel.desc: Mae Blero'n mynd i Ocido i ddarganfod pam bod angen past dannedd a brwsh i lanhau dannedd. Blero goes to Ocido to find out why toothpaste and a toothbrush are used to clean teeth.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Guto Gwningen
channel.desc: Wedi i Benja ddod o hyd i feillionen, mae Guto'n chwarae triciau arno i'w gael i gredu ei bod yn lwcus. When Benja finds a four-leaf clover, Guto tricks him saying it brings good luck.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pentre Papur Pop
channel.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw ma'r ffrindiau'n creu deinosor ar gyfer amgueddfa Pentre Papur Pop. On today's poptastic adventure the friends craft a dinosaur for the Pop Paper City museum.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Bochau wedi cael llond bol ar fwyta bresych, ac felly'n codi pac ac yn mynd ar ei wyliau i Fferm Ty Mawr! Bochau is fed up with eating cabbage all night and day and heads for the farm.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Tydi Jetboi na Jetferch ddim yn cymryd hen jet eu rhieni o ddifri: nes i Peredur greu helynt gyda'i ddyfais clogyn newydd. Neither Jet-boy nor Jet-girl take their parents' old jet seriously.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Cyfres slapstic am griw bach glas doniol. A oes rhywun wedi dod o hyd i'r ffa jeli o'r diwedd? Slapstick series about a group of funny blue men. Have they finally found their jelly beans.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.name: S4C UK
